title: Promotion is best of 5 now??
body: Just realised the grind is gonna be worse this season, esp when appears riot is making everyone start at lower mmr.

replies.body:
Promotion from one Division to the next is BO3 games. (e.g Silver 3 to Silver 2). 
Promotion from one League to the next is BO5 games. (e.g Silver 1 to Gold 5).

This is how it has always been =)
what promo are you talking about? im in s3 to s2 and its 3 games, whenever you move up a whole tier eg. silver to gold it has always been 5 games.
Tier promotion series are always 3 of 5. Divisions are always best of 3.
ok thank you.. wasn't aware of that
